english_example_sentence: The small child can easily add the new word to the dictionary.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок может легко добавить новое слово в словарь.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk, yeni kelimeyi kolayca sözlüğe ekleyebilir.
